duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, develop, and implement test strategies for web-based applications.
Analyze and develop complex test scripts and test plans for software testing.
Execute systems, integration, and regression testing of software.
Review software documentation for technical accuracy and compliance.
Develop new UI automation tests using Test Complete.
Identify testability requirements and ensure test results are documented and evaluated.
Collaborate with automation team to improve automation framework and best practices.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or relevant field (Master's preferred)
